quotes.quoteText: The Internet is the first thing that humanity has built that humanity doesn't understand, the largest experiment in anarchy that we have ever had.
No society can surely be flourishing and happy, of which the far greater part of the members are poor and miserable.
We know where you are. We know where you’ve been. We can more or less know what you’re thinking about
When I showed up, I thought this was the stupidest rule ever, because there's no book about evil except maybe, you know, the Bible or something.
